name: Fitbit Ace 3
note: The problem with Pebble and Ionic was that they are all too big. I thought if I get a smart watch designed for kids, it would fit my wrist better and I would assume it would be built more comfy too. However, there's a lot of limitation such as no heart rate sensor and I just didn't have time to see if it support custom watch face design here.

name: Fibit Ionic
note: I also wrote a custom watch face on this. I did not published this to the store because the fitbit market seems to be involving more steps. Fitbit recalled this watch because of some overheat issue and I got some cash back to buy my next one.

name: Pebble White
note: It's been too long that I forgot the price of this. This is my first smart watch! I built my custom watch face and received about 27 hearts from Pebble store. Also landed my first job with this watch project.
